full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 144 of 262 1855 LC8Cmax5 Rodgers - direct 1 A. Well, the first column has 11, and if we go up a few rows higher, you're going to see December, D-E-C, and then at the top of the page, you'll see 2000. 2 Q. Where were you flying from and where were you flying to? 3 A. Palm Beach, Florida, to Teterboro, New Jersey. 4 Q. Was Jeffrey Epstein a passenger on this flight? 5 A. Yes. 6 Q. Was Ghislaine Maxwell a passenger on this flight? 7 A. Yes. 8 Q. And then were two other passengers on this flight? 9 A. Yes. 10 Q. Was one of them named Virginia? 11 A. Yes. 12 Q. Is that the name included in this entry for this flight, just the first name? 13 A. Yes, just the first name. 14 Q. Who is Virginia? 15 A. That was Virginia Roberts. 16 Q. About when do you remember meeting Virginia Roberts? 17 A. On that day. 18 Q. In 2000? 19 A. In 2000. 20 Q. About how many times do you remember Virginia Roberts flying on Jeffrey Epstein's private planes? 21 A. 32 times. 22 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013422

1 A. Well, the first column has 11, and if we go up a few rows higher, you're going to see December, D-E-C, and then at the top of the page, you'll see 2000. 2 Q. Where were you flying from and where were you flying to? 3 A. Palm Beach, Florida, to Teterboro, New Jersey. 4 Q. Was Jeffrey Epstein a passenger on this flight? 5 A. Yes. 6 Q. Was Ghislaine Maxwell a passenger on this flight? 7 A. Yes. 8 Q. And then were two other passengers on this flight? 9 A. Yes. 10 Q. Was one of them named Virginia? 11 A. Yes. 12 Q. Is that the name included in this entry for this flight, just the first name? 13 A. Yes, just the first name. 14 Q. Who is Virginia? 15 A. That was Virginia Roberts. 16 Q. About when do you remember meeting Virginia Roberts? 17 A. On that day. 18 Q. In 2000? 19 A. In 2000. 20 Q. About how many times do you remember Virginia Roberts flying on Jeffrey Epstein's private planes? 21 A. 32 times.
